articles.title: Apple Vision Pro pre-orders are live, Apple releases a 10-minute "guided tour" video for it - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: More details about the headset are also now out. Today Apple has started taking pre-orders for its first "spatial computer", the Vision Pro headset. It...
articles.content:
Today Apple has started taking pre-orders for its first "spatial computer", the Vision Pro headset. It will become available, as previously announced, on February 2.
